containerDefinitions.name: migration
command: const{PrismaClient}=require('@prisma/client');const p=new PrismaClient();(async()=>{try{await p.$executeRawUnsafe('ALTER TABLE clinical_notes ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS "unlockRequested" BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT false;');await p.$executeRawUnsafe('ALTER TABLE clinical_notes ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS "unlockRequestDate" TIMESTAMP(3);');await p.$executeRawUnsafe('ALTER TABLE clinical_notes ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS "unlockReason" TEXT;');await p.$executeRawUnsafe('ALTER TABLE clinical_notes ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS "unlockApprovedBy" TEXT;');await p.$executeRawUnsafe('ALTER TABLE clinical_notes ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS "unlockApprovalDate" TIMESTAMP(3);');await p.$executeRawUnsafe('ALTER TABLE clinical_notes ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS "unlockUntil" TIMESTAMP(3);');console.log('SUCCESS: All missing columns added');process.exit(0)}catch(e){console.error('ERROR:',e.message);process.exit(1)}finally{await p.$disconnect()}})()
